授業目的: The purpose of this Research Seminar is for students to conduct research and write a graduation thesis on themes of their own choices.
到達目標:
Taking this course students will:
◦ acquire knowledge and skills to conduct independent research.
◦ develop academic writing, presentation, discussion skills, and communicate their research results to wider society.
◦ complete their research works and write the graduation thesis.
授業方法: この科目は教室で対面で実施します。For those who applied to take courses on-line, I will conduct real-time Teams sessions during course hours.

トピック.授業計画1:
Spring semester:
1-4 Guidance on the research proposal of each student.
5-10 Writing and presenting the revised research proposal by students. Discussion among students and the instructor.
11-14 Students will finalize their research proposal and submit it to the instructor.

Fall semester:
1-5 Data collection, data analysis, presentation, and discussion.
5-10 Turning out the draft of the complete thesis and presentations.
11-14 Final presentation, revision, and submission of the final thesis.
トピック.授業外学習2: Research seminar I, Economics related courses.

評価.教科書Required texts0: All the essential readings and other resources will be provided in the class.
成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading1: Seminar participation, presentations and research reports (thesis and its progress).
評価.成績評価Grading2:
備考　Note
Students will be graded based on 60% of the standard evaluation (presentation and discussion) and the "academic" report at the end of the semester (approximately 2,500 words). The report will be regarded as a "mini-thesis" and should be formatted and written in a strict manner similar to a graduation thesis.
As a general rule, the credits will not be granted to students who miss more than one-third of the class sessions.
